Design, Planning And Construction Under One Roof.
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Projects
  • Contact Us

SWEBB Design & Build is a top of the range Design, Planning and Construction company running out of Brentwood, Essex, United Kingdom.

SWEBB, as a company; was only recently formed however despite its youth Andy (from a hands on physical background) and Paul (from a planning, management and technical background) who formed the company have over 75 years of experience in the construction industry between them and make the perfect combination.

We offer a complete start to finish service (hence "under one roof") from converting your ideas onto paper and taking that through the planning and building control process to convert your dreams into the finished article be that a new build, an extension, a loft conversion, landscaping, internal re-planning and many more.

Our work ethic is that the customer comes first, all to often we see builders turn up in force to a job on day one then gradually tail off until the customer is begging them to return and finish off the job. We will only take on projects that can be fully resource from beginning to end this will mean that at times our start date for your project may be later than you want but believe me the experience of working with us will be worth waiting for.

We are looking forward to working with you.

Services
Design

Design is thinking made visual. Through a meet and greet consultation process with our designer; Paul Smith. He will be able to help you develop and expand your ideas into a reality. This will be held in the comfort of your home with no obligation or fee.

Planning

We offer a full planning, building control and party wall agreement service. So once we have developed your design you will be able to sit back and relax whilst we deal with local authorities on your behalf. Making your experience stress-free.

Construction

Once the design and planning has been completed and consented. With our expertise in all trades; We will be able to guarantee a high quality, bespoke finish. In all we will be able to construct from whats on paper to the real world.

Testimonals
  • Andy Pickford
    Evangelical Free Church, Harold Hill, Romford, Essex

    It would be fair to say that without your help, we most probably would not have mobilised our project to build an extension that has completely changed the profile of our church in the community. Your thoughts, ideas, and plans have resulted in the creation of a truly workable and great looking building. Your attention to detail, the quality of the work, materials, and oversight of the project has been to a very high and consistent standard.

  • Andy Pickford - Continued
    Evangelical Free Church, Harold Hill, Romford, Essex

    Your 'can-do attitude' and ability to take problems away and present solutions are extremely refreshing and in my opinion, separates you from others who make such claims, but do not necessarily deliver. This project is the first major change to the church in the last 50 years and we are very pleased to have you work in partnership with us. The members of the church are absolutely delighted with the project which has been a big step of faith, and as a Leadership Team, it has been a real pleasure and encouragement to have your professional support each step of the way.
